welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Missenden, a charming town known for its quaint countryside and rich literary history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively by the Royal Air Force.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A busy terminal serving mainly long-haul flights, with a wide range of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal for British Airways and Iberia, with a modern design and extensive shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies. Premium options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers modern and comfortable facilities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
